details.name: AS_GSS_SUGGEST_FINAL_COMMENT_PROMPT
details.sail_code_before: Type: string, Value: You are an experienced contracting user for the government. The following are a list of responses given by evaluators during a government acquisition consensus process. Based on this context, give a summarized evaluation of a vendor in one short well structured paragraph. Do not reference the responses directly.
details.sail_code_after: Type: string, Value: You are an experienced contracting user for the government. The following are a list of responses/justifications given by evaluators during a government acquisition consensus process. Based on the context, give a summary for the vendor in one short well structured paragraph about its strength and weakness. Do not reference the responses or justifications directly  and exclude Appian private AI keyword

          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          value: {
            a!richTextItem(
              text: if(
                ri!isSLGToggleOn,
                rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                  bundle: ri!bundle,
                  bundleKey: "txt_AddVendorInitialSearchForSLG"
                ),
                rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                  bundle: ri!bundle,
                  bundleKey: "txt_AddVendorInitialSearch"
                )
              )
            )
          },
          align: "CENTER",
          marginBelow: "LESS"
        ),
        a!richTextDisplayField(marginBelow: "STANDARD")
      },
      showWhen: or(
        a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!searchTerm),
        and(
          a!isNotNullOrEmpty(value: ri!searchTerm),
          ri!isSearchExecuted = false()
        )
      ),
      style: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
        brandingKey: "DefaultBackground",
        useSuiteBranding: true
      ),
      shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
      marginAbove: "LESS",
      marginBelow: "STANDARD",
      showBorder: false
    ),
    /*  Integration error message from SAM.gov  */
    a!cardLayout(
      contents: {
        a!stampField(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          icon: "exclamation-triangle",
          backgroundColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
            brandingKey: "YellowOne",
            useSuiteBranding: true
          ),
          contentColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
            brandingKey: "YellowThree",
            useSuiteBranding: true
          ),
          size: "SMALL",
          align: "CENTER",
          marginAbove: "MORE"
        ),
        a!headingField(
          text: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
            bundle: ri!bundle,
            bundleKey: "txt_SomethingWentWrong"
          ),
          headingTag: "H3",
          align: "CENTER",
          size: "EXTRA_SMALL",
          fontWeight: "BOLD",
          marginBelow: "NONE"
        ),
        a!richTextDisplayField(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          value: {
            a!richTextItem(
              text: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                bundle: ri!bundle,
                bundleKey: "txt_SAMIntegrationError"
              )
            )
          },
          align: "CENTER",
          marginBelow: "LESS"
        ),
        a!recordActionField(
          actions: rule!AS_GSS_DCRA_dynamicContextRecordAction(
            action: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:8b3931ed-e5e1-4827-b6c0-377ff72990e5/c26c6aa4-db94-4d66-8476-eadb94366bc6",
            context: a!map(
              uniqueEntityId: ri!uniqueEntityId,
              cageCode: ri!cage
            )
          ),
          style: "LINKS",
          display: "LABEL",
          align: "CENTER",
          openActionsIn: "DIALOG"
        ),
        a!richTextDisplayField(marginBelow: "STANDARD")
      },
      showWhen: and(
        ri!isSLGToggleOn = false(),
        ri!isSearchExecuted,
        ri!hasNoSearchResults,
        local!isIntegrationError,
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(value: ri!searchTerm),

      ),
      style: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
        brandingKey: "DefaultBackground",
        useSuiteBranding: true
      ),
      shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
      marginAbove: "LESS",
      marginBelow: "STANDARD",
      showBorder: false
    ),
    /*  No search results found message  */
    a!cardLayout(
      contents: {
        a!stampField(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          icon: "search",
          backgroundColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
            brandingKey: "GrayOne",
            useSuiteBranding: true
          ),
          contentColor: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
            brandingKey: "GrayThree",
            useSuiteBranding: true
          ),
          size: "SMALL",
          align: "CENTER",
          marginAbove: "MORE"
        ),
        a!headingField(
          text: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
            bundle: ri!bundle,
            bundleKey: "txt_NoResultsFound"
          ),
          headingTag: "H3",
          align: "CENTER",
          size: "EXTRA_SMALL",
          fontWeight: "BOLD",
          marginBelow: "NONE"
        ),
        a!richTextDisplayField(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          value: {
            a!richTextItem(
              text: if(
                ri!isSLGToggleOn,
                rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                  bundle: ri!bundle,
                  bundleKey: "txt_NoMatchingVendorsForSLG"
                ),
                rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                  bundle: ri!bundle,
                  bundleKey: "txt_NoMatchingVendors"
                )
              )
            )
          },
          align: "CENTER",
          marginBelow: "LESS"
        ),
        a!recordActionField(
          actions: rule!AS_GSS_DCRA_dynamicContextRecordAction(
            action: #"urn:appian:record-action:v1:8b3931ed-e5e1-4827-b6c0-377ff72990e5/c26c6aa4-db94-4d66-8476-eadb94366bc6",
            context: a!map(
              uniqueEntityId: ri!uniqueEntityId,
              cageCode: ri!cage
            )
          ),
          style: "LINKS",
          display: "LABEL",
          align: "CENTER",
          openActionsIn: "DIALOG"
        ),
        a!richTextDisplayField(marginBelow: "STANDARD")
      },
      showWhen: and(
        ri!isSearchExecuted,
        ri!hasNoSearchResults,
        not(local!isIntegrationError),
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(value: ri!searchTerm)
      ),
      style: rule!AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey(
        brandingKey: "DefaultBackground",
        useSuiteBranding: true
      ),
      shape: "SEMI_ROUNDED",
      marginAbove: "LESS",
      marginBelow: "STANDARD",
      showBorder: false
    )
  }
)

a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!isUploadInProgress: false(),
  local!isImportInProgress: false(),
  local!pendingUploadDocIds,
  local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
  local!originalEvaluationVendor: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ri!evaluationVendor,
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!isSLGToggleOn: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper(),
  local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM: if(
    cons!AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE,
    rule!AS_GSS_INT_GET_OpportunityDetailsFromVM(
      solicitationPiid: ri!evaluation[#"urn:appian:record-field:v1:e6bc8561-d3a6-4679-b7af-6e279910468e/b8cdd695-bc67-4c28-9f7e-90de99810528"]
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!opportunityDetails: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM),
    null,
    if(
      local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM.success,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM,
        field: "result.body",
        indexDefault: null
      ),
      null
    )
  ),
  local!isVMEnabled: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!opportunityDetails),
    false(),
    cons!AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE
  ),
  local!defaultFactorId: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_BL_defaultFactorDocumentMapping(
      evaluation: ri!evaluation,
      evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: {
      ri!evaluation,
      ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors
    }
  ),
  local!evaluationVendorMap: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_initializeEvaluationVendorForUpdate(
      isVMEnabled: local!isVMEnabled,

    ),
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!allDocsFromOpportunity,

      bundle: local!bundle,
      bundleKey: "lbl_UpdateVendor"
    ),
    instructions: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      bundleKey: "ins_RequiredFieldsMarked"
    ),
    skipAutoFocus: true(),
    contents: {
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_captureVendorDetailsAndDocuments(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        uploadedTemporaryDocIds: local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
        isSLGToggleOn: local!isSLGToggleOn,
        isVmEnabled: local!isVMEnabled,
        selectedVendor: local!evaluationVendorMap.currentEvaluationVendor,
        showWhen: a!isNullOrEmpty(
          local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
        ),
        totalDocsFromOpportunity: local!evaluationVendorMap.totalDocsFromOpportunity,
        isUploadInProgress: local!isUploadInProgress,
        isImportInProgress: local!isImportInProgress,
        pendingUploadDocIds: local!pendingUploadDocIds,
        allDocsFromOpportunity: local!allDocsFromOpportunity,
        selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity: local!selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity,
        selectedIndex: local!selectedIndex,
        selectedRows: local!selectedRows,
        defaultFactorId: local!defaultFactorId
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CRD_displayMessage(
        icon: "exclamation-triangle",
        title: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
          bundle: local!bundle,
          bundleKey: "txt_IntegrationFailed"
        ),
        message: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
          bundle: local!bundle,
          bundleKey: "txt_IntegrationErrorTryAgain"
        ),
        showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
          local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
        )
      )
    },
    buttons: rule!AS_GSS_BTN_buttonsForUpdateVendorForm(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      buttonAction: ri!buttonAction,
      evaluationVendor: ri!evaluationVendor,
      originalVendorDocuments: local!originalEvaluationVendor[#"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/f017ee11-aaec-48c1-bef6-ba4e201c4017"],
      documentInfo: ri!documentInfo,
      uploadedTemporaryDocIds: local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
      pendingUploadDocIds: local!pendingUploadDocIds,
      currentEvaluationVendor: local!evaluationVendorMap.currentEvaluationVendor,
      integrationFailed: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
        local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
      ),
      additionalSaves: {
        a!save(
          ri!originalEvaluationVendor,
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateEvalVendorRecordWithAllPriceBreakups(
            evalVendor: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationVendorByIdentifier(
              vendorId: local!originalEvaluationVendor[#"urn:appian:record-field:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/757685e2-1a29-4d3d-959e-2297f9a96899"],
              fields: {
                #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/f017ee11-aaec-48c1-bef6-ba4e201c4017",
                #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/f017ee11-aaec-48c1-bef6-ba4e201c4017/c26262d6-b3ce-4f1c-a5f3-0a4581bca7d2",
                #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/2f7acf60-4d56-44d9-bed4-23c865537e27"
              }
            ),
            executeWhen: true()
          )
        )
      }
    )
  )
)

detailed_changes.sail_code_before:
a!columnsLayout(
  spacing: "SPARSE",
  showDividers: true,
  columns: {
    /*Search page*/
    a!columnLayout(
      contents: {
        a!richTextDisplayField(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          value: a!richTextItem(
            text: {
              a!richTextIcon(icon: "arrow-left"),
              " ",
              rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
                bundle: ri!bundle,
                bundleKey: "txt_BackToAddVendorSubmission"
              )
            },
            link: a!dynamicLink(
              saveInto: a!save(
                ri!pageConfig,
                rule!AS_GSS_updatePagingConfigurationForAddVendors(
                  paging: ri!pageConfig,
                  isNextAction: false(),
                  isFormPage: false(),
                  isVmSwitch: true()
                )
              )
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          ),
          showWhen: ri!isVmEnabled
        ),
        if(
          ri!isSLGToggleOn,
          rule!AS_GSS_CPS_searchVendorsForStateAndLocal(
            searchTerm: ri!searchTerm,
            searchAction: ri!searchAction,
            bundle: ri!bundle,
            returnedVendors: ri!returnedVendors
          ),
          rule!AS_GSS_CPS_searchVendors(
            searchTerm: ri!searchTerm,
            searchAction: ri!searchAction,
            bundle: ri!bundle,
            cage: ri!cage,

  local!isUploadInProgress: false(),
  local!isImportInProgress: false(),
  local!pendingUploadDocIds,
  local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
  local!originalEvaluationVendor: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ri!evaluationVendor,
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!isSLGToggleOn: rule!AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper(),
  local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM: if(
    cons!AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE,
    rule!AS_GSS_INT_GET_OpportunityDetailsFromVM(
      solicitationPiid: ri!evaluation[#"urn:appian:record-field:v1:e6bc8561-d3a6-4679-b7af-6e279910468e/b8cdd695-bc67-4c28-9f7e-90de99810528"]
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!opportunityDetails: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM),
    null,
    if(
      local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM.success,
      rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
        cdt: local!getMatchingOpportunityFromVM,
        field: "result.body",
        indexDefault: null
      ),
      null
    )
  ),
  local!isVMEnabled: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!opportunityDetails),
    false(),
    cons!AS_GSS_BOL_VENDOR_MANAGEMENT_INTEGRATION_TOGGLE
  ),
  local!defaultFactorId: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_BL_defaultFactorDocumentMapping(
      evaluation: ri!evaluation,
      evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: {
      ri!evaluation,
      ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors
    }
  ),
  local!evaluationVendorMap: a!refreshVariable(
    value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_initializeEvaluationVendorForUpdate(
      isVMEnabled: local!isVMEnabled,
      evaluationVendor: ri!evaluationVendor,
      evaluation: ri!evaluation
    ),
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  local!allDocsFromOpportunity,
  local!selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity,
  local!selectedIndex,
  local!selectedRows,
  a!formLayout_v1(
    label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      bundleKey: "lbl_UpdateVendor"
    ),
    instructions: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      bundleKey: "ins_RequiredFieldsMarked"
    ),
    skipAutoFocus: true(),
    contents: {
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_captureVendorDetailsAndDocuments(
        bundle: local!bundle,
        evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors: ri!evaluationFactorsAndSubFactors,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        uploadedTemporaryDocIds: local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
        isSLGToggleOn: local!isSLGToggleOn,
        isVmEnabled: local!isVMEnabled,
        selectedVendor: local!evaluationVendorMap.currentEvaluationVendor,
        showWhen: a!isNullOrEmpty(
          local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
        ),
        totalDocsFromOpportunity: local!evaluationVendorMap.totalDocsFromOpportunity,
        isUploadInProgress: local!isUploadInProgress,
        isImportInProgress: local!isImportInProgress,
        pendingUploadDocIds: local!pendingUploadDocIds,
        allDocsFromOpportunity: local!allDocsFromOpportunity,
        selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity: local!selectedDocsInImportFromOpportunity,
        selectedIndex: local!selectedIndex,
        selectedRows: local!selectedRows,
        defaultFactorId: local!defaultFactorId
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CRD_displayMessage(
        icon: "exclamation-triangle",
        title: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
          bundle: local!bundle,
          bundleKey: "txt_IntegrationFailed"
        ),
        message: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
          bundle: local!bundle,
          bundleKey: "txt_IntegrationErrorTryAgain"
        ),
        showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
          local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
        )
      )
    },
    buttons: rule!AS_GSS_BTN_buttonsForUpdateVendorForm(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      buttonAction: ri!buttonAction,
      evaluationVendor: ri!evaluationVendor,
      originalVendorDocuments: local!originalEvaluationVendor[#"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/f017ee11-aaec-48c1-bef6-ba4e201c4017"],
      documentInfo: ri!documentInfo,
      uploadedTemporaryDocIds: local!uploadedTemporaryDocIds,
      pendingUploadDocIds: local!pendingUploadDocIds,
      currentEvaluationVendor: local!evaluationVendorMap.currentEvaluationVendor,
      integrationFailed: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
        local!evaluationVendorMap.integrationError
      ),
      additionalSaves: {
        a!save(
          ri!originalEvaluationVendor,
          rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateEvalVendorRecordWithAllPriceBreakups(
            evalVendor: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationVendorByIdentifier(
              vendorId: local!originalEvaluationVendor[#"urn:appian:record-field:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/757685e2-1a29-4d3d-959e-2297f9a96899"],
              fields: {
                #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/f017ee11-aaec-48c1-bef6-ba4e201c4017",
                #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/f017ee11-aaec-48c1-bef6-ba4e201c4017/c26262d6-b3ce-4f1c-a5f3-0a4581bca7d2",
                #"urn:appian:record-relationship:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/2f7acf60-4d56-44d9-bed4-23c865537e27"
              }
            ),
            executeWhen: true()
          )
        )
      }
    )
  )
)

        ),
        #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:9c497e08-f4c6-4fbd-bf14-5638dc226230/f7ef236a-fba6-483a-80ae-f15adb0c05eb",
        null

  local!evaluationVendors: a!refreshVariable(

              ),

                operator: "<=",

              a!queryFilter(

                  #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:b6081510-0d11-4d51-8eba-966610b168db/e1a1e205-1897-4d7c-a8a3-6d79a6af4492"
                ),

                value: local!searchTerm,
                applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!searchTerm)
              ),
              /*Name*/

                operator: "includes",

  local!vendorDocs: a!refreshVariable(

          operator: "not null"
        ),

      },
      logicalExpression: {
        /*Query logical expression to filter documents based on user's access*/
        if(
          local!assignedContractingTeamUsers,
          null,
          if(
            all(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(_),
              {
                local!combinedCriteriaIds,
                local!mappingEvalDocIds,
                local!visibleConsensusDocIds
              }
            ),

              ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
              operator: "AND",

              )
            ),

                a!queryLogicalExpression(

                  filters: {
                    /*Consensus report docs*/

                      field: #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:9c497e08-f4c6-4fbd-bf14-5638dc226230/f7ef236a-fba6-483a-80ae-f15adb0c05eb",
                      operator: "in",
                      value: tointeger(local!visibleConsensusDocIds),

                      operator: "in",

                      applywhen: and(
                        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!mappingEvalDocIds),
                        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!combinedCriteriaIds)
                      )
                    )
                  }
                )
              }
            )
          )
        )
      },
      triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
    ),
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: true,
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),

      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!selectedDocumentId),

        rule!AS_GSS_FM_evaluationVendorsFilters(

          vendorDocuments: local!vendorDocs,

          showPricingInfo: local!showPricingInfo,

          summaryLinks: local!summaryLinks

            bundleKey: "lbl_BackToVendorTab"
          ),
          saveInto: {

        rule!AS_GSS_CPS_selectedEvaluationDocumentView(
          selectedDocumentId: local!selectedDocumentId,
          i18nData: local!i18nData
        )
      }
    )
  )
)

      ascending: true()

    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: {

  local!vendorInfo: a!refreshVariable(

      defaultFactorId: local!defaultFactorId

              value: tostring(local!searchTerm),
              applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!searchTerm)

              operator: "includes",
              value: tostring(upper(local!searchTerm)),

              operator: "includes",
              value: tostring(local!searchTerm),
              applyWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(local!searchTerm)

          }
        ),
        a!queryLogicalExpression(
          operator: "OR",
          filters: {
            a!queryFilter(
              field: #"urn:appian:record-field:v1:0138bd87-14ee-4377-bfc9-182baa8e96d6/a0598118-f58c-4403-9388-cdf9a9e8c470",
              operator: "=",
              value: if(
                a!isNullOrEmpty(local!searchTerm),

  local!returnedVendorsCount: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!returnedVendors),
    0,
    length(ri!returnedVendors)
  ),
  local!returnedVendorsCountWithEmptyCards: a!match(
    value: local!returnedVendorsCount,
    whenTrue: fv!value < 3,
    then: 3,
    default: local!returnedVendorsCount
  ),
  a!cardGroupLayout(
    cardWidth: if(
      a!isPageWidth(
        {
          "DESKTOP_NARROW",
          "DESKTOP",
          "DESKTOP_WIDE"
        }
      ),
      "NARROW_PLUS",
      "NARROW"
    ),
    marginBelow: "NONE",
    spacing: "DENSE",
    cards: a!forEach(
      items: enumerate(
        local!returnedVendorsCountWithEmptyCards
      ) + 1,
      expression: if(
        ri!isSLGToggleOn,
        rule!AS_GSS_CRD_selectVendorForStateAndLocal(
          bundle: ri!bundle,
          existingEvaluationVendors: ri!existingEvaluationVendors,
          currentVendorCard: index(ri!returnedVendors, fv!index, null),
          evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
          selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
          isVmPage: ri!isVmPage,
          allVmVendorIdentifiers: ri!allVmVendorIdentifiers
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_CRD_selectVendorForFederal(
          bundle: ri!bundle,
          existingEvaluationVendors: ri!existingEvaluationVendors,
          currentVendorCard: index(ri!returnedVendors, fv!index, null),
          evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
          selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
          isVmPage: ri!isVmPage,
          allVmVendorIdentifiers: ri!allVmVendorIdentifiers
        )
      )
    ),
    showWhen: a!defaultValue(ri!showWhen, false())
  )
)
detailed_changes.sail_code_after:
{
  a!forEach(
    items: ri!searchResultsMap.vendors,
    expression: if(
      ri!isSLGToggleOn,
      rule!AS_GSS_CRD_selectVendorFromGSM_StateAndLocal(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        existingVendors: ri!existingVendors,
        currentVendor: rule!AS_GSS_UT_constructEvaluationVendorForSelection(
          vendorMap: fv!item,
          evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
          vendorAddressTypes: ri!vendorAddressTypes,
          refStates: ri!refStates,
          refCountries: ri!refCountries
        ),
        selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
        currentVendorInMap: fv!item,
        refCountries: ri!refCountries,
        allVmVendorIdentifiers: ri!allVmVendorIdentifiers
      ),
      rule!AS_GSS_CRD_selectVendorFromGSM_Federal(
        bundle: ri!bundle,
        existingVendors: ri!existingVendors,
        currentVendor: rule!AS_GSS_UT_constructEvaluationVendorForSelection(
          vendorMap: fv!item,
          evaluationId: ri!evaluationId,
          vendorAddressTypes: ri!vendorAddressTypes,
          refStates: ri!refStates,
          refCountries: ri!refCountries
        ),
        selectedVendorsMap: ri!selectedVendorsMap,
        currentVendorInMap: fv!item,
        refCountries: ri!refCountries,
        allVmVendorIdentifiers: ri!allVmVendorIdentifiers
      )
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_footerForSearchResultsFromSuite(
    manualVendorMap: ri!manualVendorMap,
    bundle: ri!bundle,
    triggerRefresh: {},
    isCreateVendorManually: ri!isCreateVendorManually,
    searchResultsMap: ri!searchResultsMap,
    searchAndFiltersMap: ri!searchAndFiltersMap,
    showWhen: and(
      toboolean(ri!searchAndFiltersMap.isSearched) = true(),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!searchResultsMap.vendors)
    ),
    isSLGToggleOn: ri!isSLGToggleOn
  )
}
